moduleConfigs.about: The Questionnaire feature is an easy way of collecting information about your health. Answering all questions and sharing this information will allow your care team to make better treatment decisions.

The Questionnaire feature is an easy way of collecting information about your health. Answering all questions and sharing this information will allow your care team to make better treatment decisions.
